contents.markdown: The handbook is structured into eight chapters, with exercises to help you reflect on your reading throughout. If you'd like to discuss these ideas with other people who are interested in improving the lives of others, you may be interested in our [free introductory EA program](https://www.effectivealtruism.org/virtual-programs/introductory-program), which is based on this handbook.

sequences.title: What could the future hold? And why care?
